title: We need to raise awareness about Net Neutrality.
body:
Recently I saw a post talking about how serious taking down Net Neutrality would be; and I 100 percent agree. If this goes through in December, it would probably be one of the BIGGEST changes to affect NA in general, let alone us gamer's as well. 


https://www.savetheinternet.com/net-neutrality-what-you-need-know-now

https://www.battleforthenet.com/

https://www.publicknowledge.org/issues/net-neutrality

Pls spread awareness about this. You never know how much it could affect you in the future... :(
